WorkItem.Description:
To replicate: Load character, view buffs page, add/remove any potion from this list and observe that dps doesn't change...
Â 
1) Potion of Speed (500 haste for 15 sec once per fight)
2) Potion of Wild Magic (200 spellpower, 200 crit 15 sec once per fight)
3) Volcanic Potion (1200 spellpower 25 sec once per fight)

Comments.Message: I doubt that they're having no effect, but it bears looking into.
What I meant was that on ticking or unticking the boxes there was no change in the dps figures in the status bars.

I read that. ;) What I'm saying is that I imagine the buff is getting counted, but something in my uptime calculations is off (because in the backend, once per fight is having the cooldown set to infinity, or something).
The set to infinity thing is as intended. That acts as a flag in the SpecialEffects handling to make it "Once Per Fight" instead of on a "Frequency of Activates".
Uh, yes, I know that.  I think my proc handling code probably doesn't handle that correctly.
